long_description: Carry your essentials while keeping your hands free with the REI Lode waistpack. Its 2 liter capacity is perfect for travel, light day hikes, biking and even on the ski lifts. Post-consumer recycled PET polyester is tough enough to endure the daily grind. Main compartment features an organizer with pen slots, phone/wallet pocket, key clip and a zippered mesh pocket. Zippered front panel pocket and waistbelt wing pocket secure small items such as lip balm, pocket knife or spare change. Webbing waistbelt stows away behind back panel when using the carry handle. REI Lode Waistpack fits waist/hips from 22 - 48 in. Special buy.
short_description: Carry your essentials while keeping your hands free with the REI Lode waistpack. Its 2 liter capacity is perfect for travel, light day hikes, biking and even on the ski lifts.
